entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as beaming and seizing Harry by the shoulders. He is also referred to as Arthur by Madam Bones.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being tried by the full court and is nodded at by a few wizards as they pass.

entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones is described as saying 'Morning, Arthur' to Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge is described as acting as though Mr. Weasley and Harry were part of the wall.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as ignoring his father, Mr. Weasley.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley seized Harry by the shoulders.
Madam Bones said 'Morning, Arthur' to Mr. Weasley.
Cornelius Fudge acted as though Mr. Weasley and Harry were part of the wall.
Percy ignored his father, Mr. Weasley.
